Biography

2017 SEC First-Year Academic Honor Roll

AS A JUNIOR (2017): Junior college transfer who saw limited action in his one season in Gainesville, pitching two innings without allowing a run…Pitched a scoreless inning against Seton Hall with a pair of strikeouts…Second appearance came in the 2017 SEC Tournament in Hoover, pitching one scoreless inning against Arkansas despite hitting three batters…Named to the SEC First-Year Academic Honor Roll…Drafted in the 27th round of the 2017 MLB Draft by the Pittsburgh Pirates (808 overall).

PRIOR TO UF: Drafted in the 38th round by the San Francisco Giants in the 2016 MLB First-Year Player Draft…Made 14 starts as a sophomore at Santa Fe College and had a 6-2 record and 4.00 earned run average in 54 innings pitched…Totaled 58 strikeouts, a 9.67 K/9 ratio…Played his first year of college ball at FIU, where the Panthers won the 2015 C-USA title, then transferred to Santa Fe…At FIU, had a 2-2 record with a 4.42 ERA in 36.2 innings pitched with 39 strikeouts…Named First Team All-Area in high school at Buchholz.
